segments.text: What are you doing in this neighbourhood ? Do you live around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , my office is right around the corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was great to meet you last week at the conference . I really enjoyed our conversation about foreign investment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , yeah , it was really interesting . You know , I'm in a bit of a hurry , but here ’ s my card . We should definitely meet up again and continue our discussion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , you still have my contact details , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know what , this is really embarrassing , but your name has just slipped my mind . Can you remind me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , my name is Ana Ferris . Don ’ t worry about it . it happens to me all the time . I ’ m terrible with names too .
segments.speaker: S1
